body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}


In this conversation, the agent's name is Jason Johnson and the customer's name is Margaret Perry.  The conversation is about Meta4 (a Jewellery Store ) and is a conversation about customer service.The customer is feeling {emotion}.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, my name is Jason Johnson, and I am here to assist you at Meta4, your premier jewellery store. May I have your name, please?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Margaret! How can I help you today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I'm feeling a bit frustrated with my recent order.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I’m sorry to hear that. Can you specify what seems to be the problem?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Well, my necklace hasn’t arrived yet, and it’s been two weeks.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I understand your frustration, Margaret. To help resolve this, could you please provide me with the order number?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, it’s one two three four five.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you! And could you please confirm the email associated with the order?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for the information, Margaret. I will check the status of your order right away.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: You're welcome! Thank you for your time today, and I will follow up with you shortly about your order. Have a great day!
